<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>89550</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DUNEL_sample</catalog>
            <entry>0004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">KS2 Literacy Y4 Adjectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">KS2 Adjektive Des Bildungsgrad-Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">KS2 Adjectifs de l'Instruction Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">KS2 Adjetivos Do Literacy Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">KS2 Aggettivi Di Literacy Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">KS2 επίθετα βασικής εκπαίδευσης Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">KS2 Adjetivos De la Instrucción Y4</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Understand and recognise adjectives are used to describe or give information about nouns Using alternative words and expressions which are more accurate or interesting Matching adjectives with synonyms Using adjectives correctly in context.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">analyse language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word class</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nouns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">adjectives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">verbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">synonyms</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstehen Sie und erkennen Sie Adjektive werden 
verwendet, Informationen über Gegenstandswörter mit alternativen 
Wörtern und Ausdrücken zu beschreiben oder zu geben, die genauere 
oder interessantere zusammenpassende Adjektive mit Synonymen mit 
Adjektiven richtig im Kontext sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comprenez et identifiez les adjectifs sont 
utilisés pour décrire ou fournir des informations sur des noms en 
utilisant les mots et les expressions alternatifs qui sont des 
adjectifs assortis plus précis ou plus intéressants avec des 
synonymes en utilisant des adjectifs correctement dans le contexte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreenda e reconheça adjetivos são usados 
descrever ou dar a informação sobre substantivos usando as palavras 
e as expressões alternativas que são uns adjetivos combinando mais 
exatos ou interessando com synonyms usando adjetivos corretamente no 
contexto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capisca e riconosca gli aggettivi sono usati 
descrivere o fornire le informazioni sui nomi usando le parole e le 
espressioni alternative che sono aggettivi di corrispondenza più 
esatti o interessanti con i sinonimi usando gli aggettivi 
correttamente nel contesto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλάβετε και αναγνωρίστε ότι τα επίθετα 
χρησιμοποιούνται για να περιγράψουν ή να δώσουν τις πληροφορίες 
για τα ουσιαστικά χρησιμοποιώντας τις εναλλακτικές λέξεις και τις 
εκφράσεις που είναι ακριβέστερα ή ενδιαφέροντα ταιριάζοντας με 
επίθετα με τα συνώνυμα που χρησιμοποιούν τα επίθετα σωστά στο 
πλαίσιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entienda y reconozca los adjetivos se utilizan 
describir o dar la información sobre sustantivos usando las palabras 
y las expresiones alternativas que son adjetivos que corresponden con 
más exactos o más interesantes con sinónimos usando adjetivos 
correctamente en contexto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">analysieren Sie Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fassen Sie Kategorie ab</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenstandswörter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Adjektive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exprimez la classe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">noms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">adjectifs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">verbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">synonymes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">analise a língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exprima a classe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substantivos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
